chatbot.evidence: The customer mentioned interacting with a chatbot named Tobi.
chatbot.description: The customer is complaining about the chatbot Tobi not being able to provide the necessary options and not being able to connect to a real person.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's capabilities to handle a wider range of queries and provide an option for customers to speak to a real person.

complaint.description: The customer purchased R200 airtime but did not receive it. They have been unable to reach a customer service operator and are frustrated with the chatbot.
complaint.suggestion: Resolve the issue by providing the customer with the purchased airtime and improve customer service by ensuring prompt response from operators.

meta.review_content: I bought R200 airtime the 10th of Oct 2022 and never received it. It's the next day today and still nothing. I called the million times and no operator picks up the phone. They make me chat to stupid Tobi who doesn't even have my options in the queries. I want to speak to a real person so that I can get my airtime. Vodacom is annoying with this robot****
